page.title: 06TRADE: SHOPPING
page.content: My group asked children in the school where their parents went shopping for food and we also went to the{Market {Square}and asked some of the people there. Most people living in{Potton shop in the town. They use both local supermarkets though many choose to go shopping at a large supermarket in {Kempston.}Most of the people asked, shop at least once a week and only a few shop every day. Those shopping out of town usually just shop once a month.{Fridays}and{Saturdays}were popular shopping days and many people use their cars to get to the shops. Parking can be a problem and it is hoped that a car park will be built in Potton, as most people, at present, park around the Square. Nobody shopping and living in Potton had far to go as the town is quite small.
